comments.comment: For people who don't know about Kyriakos Grizzly, he sustained an injury a long time ago when he did regular lifting. His lifts now are unconventional but it's an effective workout without making his injury worse. His mobility and the way he moves mass is pretty impressive. Send your support.
The way he's over here trapped under his dumbbells, sounding off like a fucking Geiger counter. Art in it's finest form.
The fact this guy is supporting the weight of half a vehicle and he's not even in his prime strength any more is a truly terrifying thought. Nothing but support for  him
The craziest thing is that the Bloat Lord can bust out 10 pullups like it's nothing even at that weight. He legitimately is strong as fuck
I am so happy Felix finally discovered the god of bloat himself.
I lkie how everyone is making jokes but they are all filled with sheer respect for the man.
I like how marzia ran back after pewds went quiet they're so adorable man

Kyriakos has the best community of all communities. 
Just his comment section alone is a masterpiece on its own
This man trains for the sole purpose to always be able to say "yes", when asked "here, can you hold this?".
I love how he’s struggling to lift one dumbbell then proceeds to ask Marzia to lift the other one for him

I had read somewhere that Kyriakos Grizzly was an up and coming Greek athlete in weightlifting with his career being cut short because of an injury. Since then he continued training, going for particular exercises that do not affect his injury, that is why so often he lifts unconventionally. He is a very gentle guy and with great humour who loves not taking himself as seriously!|

By the way, Kyriakos brought me here and told me to subscribe to PewDiePie
8:20 He's actually lifting half a hyundai as a Traps isolation, the Zercher grip means he doesn't have to rely on his normal grip strength to keep up with his back/shoulders in strength.
Legend says that if Kyriakos run, instead of him moving faster the whole world start to spin faster under his feet

I'm Greek and I've been chasing Kyriakos for an interview for the last couple of months. Fingers crossed it happens. If it does it will be in Greek and I will be providing English subtitles. Guy is a legend!
I wasn't expect Felix to cover the bloatlord himself
I love how felix’s grunts sound like wet farts
Felix has been laughing a lot more after his return from his break. Great to see him well rested enough so his brain can actually process laughter. So sweet to see.
He is closest to the physique that humans need to survive a car crash.

I AM SO HAPPY PEWDS FOUND OUR AND SAVIOUR BLOATLOARD HIMSELF.

KYRIAKOS THE GREEK GOD GRIZZLY
I am so glad this man is FINALLY getting the credit and attention he deserves.

Pewdiepie: tries a small version of his workout and fails spectacularly 

KYRIAKOS KAPAKOULAK: Look what they need to mimic a fraction of our power

It's important to remember that grizzly was a serious weightlifter/powerlifter when he was younger but due to the many injuries he suffered (such as a torn quadricep) he is unable to perform traditional back squats without a box limiting his range of motion and also he can't perform any pressing exercises to train his shoulders which is why he does so many zercher and high pull exercises as they train the shoulders without having to press weight. He is from a poor region of Greece and wasn't able to get medical help for his injuries and despite that he still performs incredible feats of strength that i have never seen replicated by even some of the strongest men in the world. M'lord is truly a specimen that will never be seen again.

"He never goes faster than this speed because faster would be considered cardio"
the best one so far
The way he is literally just standing and yelling at 5:55 has me laughing so hard. Like, he just slumps forward slightly and screams as hard as he can as if his body is rebooting or shutting down
Marzia walking away quietly and running back quickly to check on his struggle to find success is such a mood.
He was part of the greek weightlifting team, at some point tore his tricep.  Could not afford the surgery to repair it, had to adapt his training due to his limited movement range.
This guy could voice Godzilla
As a fellow Greek, I'm honored to share my ethnicity with this god amongst men

Ngl, that "replication attempt" Felix did is probably one of his most dangerous stunts yet

I love this type of content from Felix. It is him truly enjoying himself,  every time he laughs so genuinely I can’t help but smile, love seeing him do what he really likes instead of what others prefer.

"This is a man that saw God himself in the eyes and said "I will surpass him""
This has to be the most genius PewDiePie quote of all time
You know all joking aside pewds actually looks like he's put on some mass. Congratulations my good man.

I know you’re all joking (respectfully) about him but he’s one of the main reason I started working out. Seeing what he can do motivates me to do better. He frequently reposts stories of his viewers working out when they tag him on instagram which motivates them and other viewers like me. I dream of a day I can be proud enough of my body to tag him.

YOU HAVE TO LIVE IT!

the weird shrug exercise is so that he can use both his arms and his belly as a surface to hold the weight bar to help distribute the weight evenly, probably to minimize his chances of injury like hernias while lifting that much. doing it that way also allows him to use almost his whole body to lift things instead of an isolated set of muscles.
.
he can do it that way because he has a large enough belly with a a solid enough muscle mass in it but also enough fat to pad-out and protect the muscle.
The Grizzly is unironically insanely strong and powerful. Jokes aside, the man is a beast. Awesome to see him get recognition by someone who has as large a following as PewDiePie has.

How to approach a girl:

"Hi"

8:00 Zercher just means the barbell is held in the crooks of the elbows. You can do squats, deadlifts, shrugs, good mornings, front raises, and carries using the zercher variations.

They have real benefits, too. Zercher squats help people with long legs make their squats more quad dominant and can help build your front squats even if you're still working on the mobility needed to properly front rack the barbell. Zercher good mornings will work your posterior chain just like normal good mornings but with the added benefit of working your traps and rhomboids at the same time. Zercher carries will work the traps and upper back just like farmers carries but also loads the biceps and recruits more core strength than traditional farmers carries.
Haven’t seen Pewds in a bit, noticeable gains in the arms and delts department. Official member of liftwaffen confirmed.
